Main: ^Uhh... That didn't seem to work. But, uhh— I thought that the cable would be where the issue would be at, strange...
^Ah! I think I know, uhh, what the issue could be... Up in the cliffs somewhere there is an entrance to where the water gets pumped from the ground into the Kettle...
^There is another problem however, little friend. To reach it you will need some more oomph to your equipment...
Climbing: ^I don't think we something like that laying around, as we are uhh— natural-born climbers...
Weapon: ^I don't think violence is the answer to the problem right now— or ever really...
Explosives: ^Wow, wow, wow— I think that's not the way to go for the problem at hand!
No: ^I was thinking more of something that extends your jump. Hmm...
^You could go over to the workshop ran by Valo, my younger cousin— they might have just the thing you need!
OMW: ^You got this little friend, but come back to me anytime you need a refresher...
